title: David Cameron you forgot to shine light on 3 Britishers killed by LTTE in Sri Lanka
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Those preparing the speeches of David Cameron and advising him what to say in Sri Lanka have made a big blunder – they have forgotten to mention that 3 Britishers were killed on 3 May 1986 when the plane they were onboard was bombed by the LTTE killing the…
